title: Episode 39 (video): Mashups and the Future of Psychological Research
description:
Have you heard about Mashups? What do they have to do with psychology? In this video episode I'll show you how you use RSS feeds, Google Reader, and Yahoo Pipes to create a mashup that searches the...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Have you heard about Mashups? In this video episode I'll show you how you use RSS feeds, Google Reader, and Yahoo Pipes to create a mashup that searches the web for the very latest information on psychological terms of interest to you.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
